title: swiping gestures with 4a
content: Your search - I'm using swiping gestures with my new 4a, in particular swiping up to get out of an app. in my previous pixel, clicking on the square box at the bottom of the screen, and swiping any of the shown apps up and away freed, I think, the memory being used by that app. Does this also happen with the 4a gesture, or is the app still somehow open in the background.
